vz:grid.vz:dataSource: let apps = ApplicationNameMappings | project ApplicationName , ServiceType , sla, GroupName; let wcfapps = apps | where ServiceType == "WCF" | project ApplicationName , sla, GroupName; let nonwcfapps = apps | where ServiceType != "WCF"| project ApplicationName , sla , GroupName; let events = event | where timestamp >= todatetime("@dateFrom") and timestamp <= todatetime("@dateTo") ; let requestEvents = events | where telemetryType == @'request' and event_Name !has "/Content/" and event_Name !has ".js" and event_Name !has "swagger" and event_Name !has "function()" and event_ResponseCodeOrResultCode matches regex "[[:digit:]]"; let availabilityResult = events |where telemetryType == @'availabilityResult' ; let metrics = wcfapps | join ( metric | where telemetryType == @'metric' and timestamp >= todatetime("@dateFrom") and timestamp <= todatetime("@dateTo") and metric_Name startswith "[WCF Service]" | project operation_Id, ApplicationName = app_Name) on ApplicationName ; apps | join kind=leftouter ( availabilityResult |extend ApplicationName =app_Name ,event_Success = toint(event_Success) |union kind = inner ( event | where timestamp >= todatetime("@dateFrom") and timestamp <= todatetime("@dateTo") and event_Name == "OutsideIndata" | extend event_Success = toint(iff(customDimensions["Result"] == "True", 1, 0)) , ApplicationName =app_Name) ) on ApplicationName |summarize Availability =(sum(toint(event_Success) ) * 100.0)/ count() by GroupName | join kind=leftouter ( nonwcfapps | join kind=inner (requestEvents | where event_ResponseCodeOrResultCode !in ("400", "401", "402", "403", "404", "409", "412") | where operation_SyntheticSource != "Application Insights Availability Monitoring" | extend Success = iff(event_Success == @'True', 1, 0) , ApplicationName = app_Name ) on ApplicationName | union ( wcfapps | join kind=inner (metrics |join kind=inner ( requestEvents | where event_ResponseCodeOrResultCode !in ("400", "401", "402", "403", "404", "409", "412") | where operation_SyntheticSource != "Application Insights Availability Monitoring" | project ApplicationName=app_Name, event_Success, operation_Id ) on operation_Id | extend Success = iff(event_Success == @'True', 1, 0)) on ApplicationName) | summarize Reliability = todouble(sum(Success) * 100)/count() by GroupName )on GroupName | join kind=leftouter ( nonwcfapps | join kind=inner ( requestEvents | where event_Success == @'True' | project ApplicationName=app_Name, event_Duration ) on ApplicationName | extend Success = iff(toint(event_Duration) < sla, 1, 0) | union ( wcfapps| join kind=inner ( metrics |join kind=inner ( requestEvents |where event_Success == @'True' | project ApplicationName=app_Name, event_Duration, operation_Id ) on operation_Id ) on ApplicationName | extend Success = iff(toint(event_Duration) < sla, 1, 0)) | summarize Performance = todouble(sum(Success) * 100)/count() by GroupName ) on GroupName | project GroupName, Availability = floor(Availability * 100, 1)/100, Reliability = floor(Reliability * 100, 1)/100, Performance = floor(Performance * 100, 1)/100 | sort by GroupName asc
